remarks: Transfinite Induction Schema, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2003.)
statement:
tfis3.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
tfis3.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
tfis3.3 $e |- ( x e. On -> ( A. y e. x ps -> ph ) ) $.
tfis3 $p |- ( A e. On -> ch ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
